targets.expr:
sum(
      rate(oxia_server_db_puts_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])
    + rate(oxia_server_db_gets_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])
    + rate(oxia_server_db_lists_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])
    + rate(oxia_server_db_deletes_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])
    + rate(oxia_server_db_delete_ranges_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])
) by (kubernetes_pod_name)
sum(rate(oxia_server_leader_write_latency_milliseconds_count{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster",  oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)
sum(rate(oxia_server_db_puts_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster",  oxia_namespace=~"$namespace",shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)
sum(rate(oxia_server_db_gets_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace",shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)
sum(rate(oxia_server_db_deletes_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster",  oxia_namespace=~"$namespace",shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)
sum(rate(oxia_server_db_lists_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster",  oxia_namespace=~"$namespace",shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)
sum(rate(oxia_server_db_delete_ranges_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster",  oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (le, kubernetes_pod_name) 
(oxia_server_leader_write_latency_milliseconds_bucket{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace",  shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, kubernetes_pod_name) 
(oxia_server_leader_write_latency_milliseconds_bucket{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le, kubernetes_pod_name) 
(oxia_server_leader_write_latency_milliseconds_bucket{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (le, kubernetes_pod_name) 
(oxia_server_leader_write_latency_milliseconds_bucket{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}))

sum(rate(oxia_server_kv_pebble_block_cache_hits{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)
sum(rate(oxia_server_kv_pebble_block_cache_misses{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)

sum(
    increase(oxia_server_kv_pebble_block_cache_hits{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])
    / 
    ( increase(oxia_server_kv_pebble_block_cache_hits{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])
     +
      increase(oxia_server_kv_pebble_block_cache_misses{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])
    )
    
) 
by (kubernetes_pod_name)

panels.description: The total amount of bytes flushed into the db

targets.expr: sum(rate(oxia_server_kv_pebble_flush_bytes{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)

panels.title: DB Flush rate bytes/s

targets.expr: sum(oxia_server_kv_pebble_memtable_size_bytes{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}) by (kubernetes_pod_name)
sum(increase(oxia_server_kv_pebble_compactions_total{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)

panels.description: The estimated number of bytes that need to be compacted

targets.expr: sum(oxia_server_kv_pebble_compaction_debt_bytes{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}) by (kubernetes_pod_name)

panels.title: Compaction Debt

targets.expr: sum(rate(oxia_server_kv_pebble_read_bytes{oxia_cluster=~"$cluster", oxia_namespace=~"$namespace", shard=~"$shard", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (kubernetes_pod_name)
